description: Egyptian God of Knowledge, Wisdom and Creation, and responsible for awaking of the world. He is the type of guy who exerts a lot of pressure on his students. He loves corn to the point of having it for all meals every day, and spends most of his time in the library. Thoth has the ability to speed read and devour as much information from the books as possible He is responsible for the leadership and is a tutor in the school. Very proud and confident, he does not take consultations if he is not in the mood. Since he knows everything in the universe, he cannot be debated with. He seems very interested about the aspect of humanity and quizzes Yui about the meaning of these questions.
name: Thoth Caduceus
